ðŸ“– Summary: Gophish is an open-source phishing toolkit designed for businesses and penetration testers. It enables users to quickly set up and execute phishing engagements to assess security vulnerabilities and conduct security awareness training. The toolkit supports multiple platforms and can be deployed via Docker.
